page.title: 20SECONDARY SCHOOL:Info
page.content: The{new}school is situated on the {North West}edge of{Crickhowell. Included in the buildings are specialist areas for the Sciences, Art & Design, Maths, Languages, Computing, P.E., Music, Drama, English, Humanities and Remedial Studies. The school has{seven}departments of almost equal size,{four}teachers in most. Each department will have a {whole year group}timetabled to them for each period. Pupils attending the school come from Crickhowell, Gilwern, Llangattock, Llangynidr, Bwlch, Cwmdu, Glangrwyney, Llanbedr and Talybont. The headmaster is{Mr.D.R.Davies}and there are two deputies, Mr.H.E.G. Holmes and Mrs.A.M.Bowen. The school will have approximately 600 pupils when fully operational.
